name: We Shall Fight in the Beaches
name_original: We Shall Fight in the Beaches
description:
It's the apocalypse! The monsters are coming from the sea and you have to stop them.

This is the very first game Softroad has produced but the first of many more to come.

Let us know how we did and leave us a comment below whether you liked it or not.

Good luck!

PS - This game was tested but there may still be bugs here and there. Please let us know so we can fix it on the updated versions.
